name: strand-inline-box
description: Several fully-styled inline messages. Ideal for displaying validation success and failure states, or extra information.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Instructs the component to display a specific icon and styling which denote the message type i.e. - 'error' or 'warning'.

attributes.name: maxlines
attributes.description: Limits the number of lines of text displayed in the message box, allowing vertical scrolling if necessary.

attributes.name: fitparent
attributes.description: Sets the width of the component to fill the width of it's parent element.

attributes.name: layout
attributes.description: Instructs the component to display as a styled box, or message only.
